# Data URLs

[Back](../index.md){: .button}

Data URLs can be used to embed inline file content

### Format

```
data:[<mediatype>][;base64],<data>
```

Example from the sprite which get's generated from `home-blocks`

```
data:image/png;base64,
```

### Reference

- [MDN Docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Basics_of_HTTP/Data_URIs)
